oxygenApplicationsText.title: Applications
oxygenApplicationsText.description: OxyCo monitor is beneficial for many applications and usage:

questions.question: 1. What parameters OxyCo does monitor?
questions.answer: OxyCo is designed to monitor real-time Oxygen, carbon monoxide, temperature and humidity in your air.

questions.question: 2. What is the battery capacity of the OxyCo?
questions.answer: The compact monitor is packed with a 1000mAh battery that works for a long time.

questions.question: 3. How can I access OxyCo data?
questions.answer: You can seamlessly access the OxyCo data by downloading it in different formats or transferring it to your email.

questions.question: 4. Why do Oxygen Calibration?
questions.answer: The OxyCo monitor performs Oxygen Calibration to maintain optimal accuracy in the device readings.
